name: Spaced!
description:
You are a space explorer running low on fuel in the middle of an asteroid belt. Your mission was to make it to a nearby moon, however, you will need more fuel to finish the trip. You tenaciously deduce that you can siphon power from nearby stars, but be careful, your defenses are down, so too many collisions with nearby asteroids and you'll be toast!

Your goal is to slowly make your way through the asteroid belt, collect five stars, and make it to the moon in this precision  based, arcade-style flying game. Do you have what it takes to be an ace star explorer?  

CONTROLS:

Space= Fuel

Arrow Keys= Steer Ship
